tool_description: Calculates priority scores for jobs based on SLA requirements, customer tier, urgency level, and business impact to enable proper scheduling order.

customer_tier.description: Customer service tier: premium, standard, basic

sla_hours.description: Service level agreement response time in hours

urgency_level.description: Job urgency: critical, high, medium, low

business_impact.description: Business impact level: high, medium, low

error_messages: Invalid customer tier: Must be one of [premium, standard, basic]
Invalid SLA hours: Must be a positive integer between 1 and 168
Invalid urgency level: Must be one of [critical, high, medium, low]
Invalid business impact: Must be one of [high, medium, low]
usage: Provide job details including customer tier, SLA requirements, and urgency level to calculate a normalized priority score for scheduling decisions.

priority_category.description: Priority category: urgent, high, normal, low
